fields.name: Wolf's Instinct (C1)
fields.value: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

fields.name: Suppression (C2)
fields.value: Increases CRIT Rate against enemies with less than 30% HP by 10%.

fields.name: Soul Companion (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Lightning Fang by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Bite (C4)
fields.value: When casting Claw and Thunder (Press), enemies hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

fields.name: Sharpened Claws (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Claw and Thunder by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Lupus Fulguris (C6)
fields.value:
Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as Electro DMG.
When Razor is not using Lightning Fang, a lightning strike on an enemy will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for Claw and Thunder.
